QuestData.Title: Spiritual Training: Mercy is for the Weak
QuestData.Description: You've made it this far. Others haven't.$B$BGo to Doom's Vigil, just north of here. We've rounded up all the... failures. I want you to help take care of them. It'll be good for your spiritual growth.$B$BIf this cold-blooded act gives you trouble, think of it as their second chance. Should any of them manage to kill you... well, they'll take your spot.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 5 Failed Supplicants at Doom's Vigil.
QuestData.RewardText: You're on the fast-track to success. Let us hope you don't ruin your track record with such silly notions as compassion and humaneness.$B$BCome, then. Let us discuss your future.
